resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108034</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108034</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202772</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Linking Important Geographic Sites to World Social Sciences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bindung der wichtigen geographischen Sites zu den 
Weltsozialwissenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Joindre les sites géographiques importants aux 
sciences sociales du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligando locais geográficos importantes às 
ciências sociais do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamento dei luoghi geografici importanti alle
scienze sociali del mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνδεση των σημαντικών γεωγραφικών περιοχών με τις 
παγκόσμιες κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conexión de sitios geográficos importantes a las
ciencias sociales del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn the importance of geography as it relates to significant events or periods in world Social Sciences, especially that which pertains to Europe and the United States.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen den Wert von Geographie, 
wie er auf bedeutenden Fällen oder Perioden in den 
Weltsozialwissenschaften in Verbindung steht, besonders die, die in 
Europa und die Vereinigten Staaten betrifft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront l'importance de la 
géographie comme elle associe aux événements ou aux périodes 
significatifs en sciences sociales du monde, particulièrement celle 
qui concerne l'Europe et les Etats-Unis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão a importância da 
geografia como se relaciona aos eventos ou aos períodos 
significativos em ciências sociais do mundo, especial aquela que 
pertence a Europa e aos estados unidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno l'importanza di geografia 
come si riferisce agli eventi o ai periodi significativi nelle scienze
sociali del mondo, particolarmente quella che appartiene Europa ed 
unito Dichiara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τη σημασία της γεωγραφίας 
όπως αφορά τα σημαντικές γεγονότα ή τις περιόδους παγκόσμιες 
κοινωνικές επιστήμη, ειδικά αυτή που αναφέρεται στην Ευρώπη και 
τις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán la importancia de la 
geografía como se relaciona con los acontecimientos o los períodos 
significativos en ciencias sociales del mundo, especialmente de que 
que pertenece a Europa y a los Estados Unidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GUY SWANSON
FN:GUY SWANSON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202772</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108034</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/linking-important-geographic-sites-to-world-social-sciences</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
